name: Apploors
tag_list: social-media, social-networking, influencer-marketing, social-targeting, location-based-services, brand-consumer-engagement
overview:
Apploors are converging the social web and mobile to offer amazing leveraging opportunities for enterprise and big brands in communicating, engaging and building relationships with their consumers.

Apploors help enterprise and ‘big brand’ clients understand what their consumers are thinking, how they are spending their time, and enable engagement with their consumers at the right moment, in the right place and in the best way - real social intelligence.

By enabling clients to take full advantage of the intent driven mobile channel that creates impulse, improves conversion rates, turns consumers into prosumers and then advocates Apploors are breaking new ground for brands who want to truly benefit from social media.
